name: Go Run a Dungeon
description:
Run your dungeon as 4 different classes

- Slash and smash incoming adventurers as a warrior.
- Make use of the souls of the dead as a necromancer.
- Harvest nature and the elements as an elementalist.
- Make smart and tactical decisions as a tactician.

Recruit different types of monster and creatures to fight for you

- Support units will help you keep your dungeon running, providing you with income and mana. Goblins mostly fill this role.
- Orcs, demons, slimes and more will fight for you, defending your dungeon from curious adventurers who venture too close.

Encounter different events

- Things are never dull when you are running a dungeon. Different people will pass by and events might happen. It could be the local village paying tribute to you out of fear, or a butch of fearless adventurers knocking on your door.
